text: kārūnvada, firavnvada, hāmānvada (api mē andamaṭama vināśa kara dæmuvemu). niyata vaśayenma mūsā movun veta pæhædili sādhakayanma genævit siṭiyēya. ehet movun (ovunva pratikṣēpa kara damā) bhūmiyehi uṅan̆gū vī kaṭayutu kaḷa bævin (apagē dan̆ḍuvamaṭa goduru vūha. eyin) ovunṭa bērīmaṭa nohæki viya
